name: Blindsighted
description:
A Different Kind of Platformer

Blindsighted has the player explore levels not by sight but by touch and memory. Dying is common, but you'll remember the lay of the land each time. Learn from your mistakes!

Game Features

Originally conceived for a Game Jam as nothing more than a demo, Blindsighted is now a full game!

Features:
  • Lots of unique gameplay mechanics
  • Minimalist, but captivating visuals
  • Controller support
  • 4 original pieces of music
  • More than one level! (12 base levels, 3 mastery levels.)
  • Level select with best times and best deaths
  • Optional timer and death counters
  • Accessibility features
